alert.note: Alert for Eastern Franklin; Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County; Western Franklin; Western Hampshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 03 at 2:44AM EST until February 04 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 7 PM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations of 1 to 4 inches and ice accumulations of one tenth to two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Western Franklin MA, Eastern Franklin MA, Northern Worcester MA, Western Hampshire MA and Northern Middlesex MA Counties. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 7 PM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain will change to freezing rain and sleet after midnight then to snow during Friday, especially near the Vermont and New Hampshire border.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Franklin; Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County; Western Franklin; Western Hampshire
